file_insights.name: Weaver/pkg/shell/shell.go
insights: Integrated spinner in handleValidate() with two spinners per iteration
Added detailed progress tracking for extraction and analysis steps
Implemented error handling with spinner Fail() method

file_insights.name: Weaver/pkg/spinner/spinner.go
insights: Implemented thread-safe spinner with Start/Stop/Update methods
Added success and failure completion states
Created non-TTY fallback for piped output

file_insights.name: Weaver/pkg/spinner/spinner_test.go
insights: Created comprehensive test suite with 35 tests
Covered start/stop scenarios, thread safety, message updates
Tested Success/Fail states and non-TTY behavior

patterns_discovered: Animated spinner integration across shell operations
Consistent error handling with colored status indicators
Comprehensive testing of concurrent and edge-case scenarios
gotchas_discovered: Providing visual feedback without breaking piped output
recommendations: Implement manual verification of go test/vet/build commands
Consider expanding non-TTY detection for more environments
Document spinner package usage and configuration options
